AVSEC ORDER NO. 3/2003

Subject:- Ban _on_ Steel / Metallic _cutlery

In exercise of the powers, conferred by Section 5A of the Aircraft Act,
1934 (XXII of 1934/ S.O. 1797/97), and supersession of AVSEC Order No.
10/2001 dated 31.12.2001, the Commissioner of Security, Civil Aviation,
for the purpose of security of the aircraft operations, directs that steel /
metallic cutlery excluding knife may be introduced in place of plastic
cutlery inthe Indian registered aircrafts with immediate effect.
